org.xbill.DNS
Class TTL

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xbill.DNS.TTL
public final class TTL
extends Object

Routines for parsing BIND-style TTL values. These values consist of numbers followed by 1 letter units of time (W - week, D - day, H - hour, M - minute, S - second).
